name: K.G.F
description: In the 1970s, a gangster goes undercover as a slave to assassinate the owner of a notorious gold mine

name: Kanthara
description: It involves culture of Kambla and Bhootha Kola. A human and nature conflict where Shiva is the rebellion who works against nature. A loop leads to war between villagers and evil forces. Will he able to replace peace in the village?

name: Vikranth Rona
description: Almost half a century ago, a remote village in the middle of a tropical rainforest starts witnessing a series of unexplainable events which they attribute to the supernatural.

name: Vicky Donor
description: Vicky Donor is a comedy movie based on the story of unemployeed bachlor men.

name: Bajirao Mastani
description: The heroic Peshwa Bajirao, married to Kashibai, falls in love with Mastani, a warrior princess in distress. They struggle to make their love triumph amid opposition from his conservative family.

name: Farzand
description: Kondaji Farzand, along with a large group of warriors, sets out to battle Adil Shah in order to recapture the Panhala Fort.

name: PK
description: An innocent alien lands on Earth but loses his communication device. He meets Jaggu, a heartbroken reporter, and tries to find his device. With time, he raises many thought-provoking questions.

name: Master
description: An alcoholic professor is enrolled to teach at a juvenile facility, unbeknownst to him. He soon clashes with a ruthless gangster, who uses the children as scapegoats for his crimes.
